description_en:
As the world leader in beauty, L’Oréal mission is to provide the best in cosmetics innovation to women and men around the world. Our brands in Vietnam: Maybelline New York, L’Oréal Paris, Vichy, La Roche-Posay, Lancome, shu uemura, Kiehl's, Yves Saint Laurent, L'Oréal Professionnel and Kérastase.

With almost 1000 talents, 10 brands and more to come into Vietnam, we embrace a vision to be the Beauty House of Vietnam.
